text: Arizona Donnie Barker (also Kate Barker or Ma Barker; October 8, 1873 â€“ January 16, 1935) was an American gangster. She was born in Ash Grove, Missouri. She ran the Barker gang. On January 16, 1935, Barker and her son, Fred, were killed by federal agents in Ocklawaha, Florida. The song "Ma Baker" refers to the life and crime of Ma Barker. ==References== Category:1873 births Category:1935 deaths Category:American gangsters Category:Deaths by firearm in Florida Category:People from Missouri Category:People shot and killed by law enforcement officers in the United States
title: Ma Barker
